{"id":473401791,"lang":"cpp","time":"5 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1616925591,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/473401791/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Shortest Unsorted Continuous Subarray","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findUnsortedSubarray(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int mini=2*nums.size();\n        int maxi=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size()-1;i++)\n        {\n            if(nums[i+1]<nums[i])\n            {\n                mini=min(mini,i);\n                maxi=max(maxi,i+1);\n            }\n        }\n        int ans=maxi-mini+1;\n        if(ans>nums.size())\n        {\n            return 0;\n        }\n        else\n            return maxi-mini+1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"shortest-unsorted-continuous-subarray"}
